main: ^Oh, well, I knew you would, o' course! No doubt about that.
^Killed some more o' those creatures, too, didja?
^That's right. There were more of those pick-handed bastards that attacked you. Many more. And something else --
^Somethin' else? You saw a new one? Oh, praise be!
^Careful. That wound from before does not seem healed.
^Aw hell, I've been worse off than this before. Go on and tell me, what did you see?
^There was another kind of monster that looked like a person, only it had gun parts where its head ought to be. Then, there were --
^A gun for a head! Well, ain't that --
^... In the graveyard behind the church, something was different.
^More of those things that look like scabs dragged out of hell, but they were enormous.
^Some kind of green light glowed in their veins, across their skin. It was...
^I... well, I never! This changes everythin'! Oh, oh, so many possibilities!
^You gotta go back out there, Maria! You gotta bring me samples! Real ones!
^Are those scab-things hands' real tools? Real metal and wood? Or are they livin' flesh and bone?
^I'll leave you to your theories, Ezra.
